print.name: The Archetypes
print.description: A set of twelve 15" x 22.75" newsprint posters, each features a single character named for Swiss psychoanalyst Carl Jung's twelve archetypes of personality and incorporates Maharam textiles.

print.name: Sonnhild Kestler Poster Set
print.description: A series of poster sets including four original designs and an in-depth process booklet featuring photography by Nick Ballon.

print.name: Calendar 2024
print.description: Cloth-bound weekly, monthly, and yearly agendas with lined note pages. Includes birthdates of architects and designers, moon phases, and major holidays. 132 sheets.
